syntaxtree

Class IfStatementNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • syntaxtree.SyntaxTreeNode
      • syntaxtree.StatementNode
        • syntaxtree.IfStatementNode

  • public class IfStatementNode
extends StatementNode
    Bob Laskowski, Compilers II, Dr. Erik Steinmetz, April 27th, 2017

    Represents an if statement in Mini-Pascal. An if statement includes a boolean expression and two statements (then and else).

    Author:
    Bob Laskowski

        public StatementNode getThen()
        Get the Then Statement of the IfStatementNode
        Returns:

        Get the Else Statement of the IfStatementNode
